function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Physical contact during cash transactions at ATMs","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Use of contactless payment methods such as QR code readers and bluetooth transactions","Technologies":"Contactless payment technologies","People":"Customers, bank staff","Owner":"Banks, payment technology companies"},{"Description":"High usage of call centers","Impact":"Potential for disease transmission among call center employees","Mitigation":"Implementation of remote call center operations, use of protective equipment, and regular testing of employees","Technologies":"Remote call center technology, protective equipment, testing kits","People":"Call center employees, customers","Owner":"Banks, call center management"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of elderly population to disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and severe illness among elderly population","Mitigation":"Increased outreach and support for elderly customers, education and assistance in using digital banking services","Technologies":"Digital banking platforms, educational resources","People":"Elderly customers","Owner":"Banks, government health agencies"}]}
